Welcome to
Honeygo Pediatrics


When you choose Honeygo Pediatrics, you can feel confident that you are making the best choice. We provide quality, comprehensive medical care for children of all ages. Our team consists of knowledgeable, compassionate professionals who have dedicated their careers to child-focused health care.

Board Certified Pediatricians


Your little one is your world. Trust our expert board-certified pediatric specialists to provide top notch care. Our doctors and nurses form relationships with expecting parents, babies, children, adolescents, and young adults to help them thrive.


Selecting your child’s health care provider is an important decision. Whether your child needs a checkup, vaccination or care for an illness, our staff at Honeygo are here for you. You can count on us to help you raise healthy children.


new patients
contact us
resources

Experience the Honeygo Difference!

Serving the local community for over 20 years, Honeygo Pediatrics provides quality, compassionate care from birth up to 21 years of age. We are a small tight night practice specializing in care for infants, children, adolescents, and young adults. Our team of board certified pediatricians, nurse practitioners and certified medical assistants are trained to provide the best care for our patients and their families.

Make an appointment today! Please call
410-933-8101

Our Services

Well Visits

Well visits are crucial to your the child's growth and development in order to find or prevent problems.

Sick Visits

Is your child feeling under the weather? Schedule a sick appointment with us today.

Annual Physical

Physical exams are critical checkpoints in your child’s health and growth. Regular physicals are an important part of keeping your children happy.

Immunizations and flu shots

Flu shots and other vaccines. COVID-19 PFIZER VACCINES - now offering to children 6 months old and up.

School And Sports Physicals

Is your child trying out for a school sport? It is required that your child is certified by a healthcare provider prior to participating.

Work, School, And Travel Exams

Children should have a medical examination prior to attending school or work, or engaging in travel. All involve protecting individual children and others around them.

Newborn Care

Having a new baby can evoke excitement as well as trepidation. Trust us to help you every step of the way.

Telehealth Visits

Ask about our virtual medical services. Telemedicine is available for most illnesses.

New Patients

We're accepting new patients! We look forward to meeting the needs of you and your children.

Shout out to the front office that took multiple calls/messages from a worried Mom! Thank you!

- Rosemary L.

Dr. Wisinski has been my Children’s primary care physician for over 10 years. Her professionalism, expertise and knowledge has been outstanding. She works in the office. She always takes questions, answers calls and is always there to help out in any way.
